text: The body of an older man (retired teacher) has a knife lodged in the chest. You mark the location of the body with an appropriate description, photograph, and letter. Additionally, you outline the position of the body on the floor with chalk. What should be done with them next?
option1: You touch the body in various places.
option2: You do nothing more than what you have already done. A specialist will handle the body.
option3: You remove the knife and secure it.
